attributes.action: ask Kitty Ussher to immediately stand down as the MP for Burnley and call a by-election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the fact that Kitty Ussher has used public funds to pay for a £20,000 refurbishment of her London home and avoided paying capital gains tax by telling the taxman that her Burnley house was her main home for a month, she is no longer fit to represent the people of Burnley as their MP and needs to stand down immediately

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
